actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow self-employed individuals an income tax deduction for one-half of the social security tax on self-employment income.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow self-employed individual taxpayers an income tax deduction for one-half of the social security tax on self- employment income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow self-employed individuals an income tax deduction for one-half of the social security tax on self-employment income.
